text: Ej Rasul, ʙarojason ʙigu: Agar Alloh ʙarojaton qasdi ʙadi dosta ʙosad, kist, ki sumoro az azoʙi U nigah dorad jo ʙixohad ʙa sumo rahmate arzoni dorad, kist, ki sumoro az irodai U nigah dorad. Ba durusti, U atokunanda, man'kunanda, zararrasonanda va foidadihanda ast. On munofiqon cuz Alloh ʙaroi xud dust va madadgore naxohand joft
